tool_description: An unofficial API showing all the latest news from different regions of the Philippines.
name: Philippine Regional News
title: Philippine Regional News

api_list.name: Get Latest News from Specific Region
api_list.description: Get Latest News from Specific Region
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://philippine-regional-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/region/01"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "philippine-regional-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://philippine-regional-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/region/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "philippine-regional-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
